gr.fire.browser.util
Class Cookie

java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

A utility class that represents a cookie.

static java.util.Vector splitCookies(java.lang.String cookieStr)
          From a string that contains one or more cookies this method creates a Vector with Cookie instances.
The string can have the following form: COOKIE1_NAME=COOKIE1_VALUE;ATTR1=ATTR1_VAL;ATTR2=ATTR2_VAL, COOKIE2_NAME=COOKIE2_VALUE;ATTR1=ATTR1_VAL;ATTR2=ATTR2_VAL

splitCookies

public static java.util.Vector splitCookies(java.lang.String cookieStr)
From a string that contains one or more cookies this method creates a Vector with Cookie instances.
The string can have the following form: COOKIE1_NAME=COOKIE1_VALUE;ATTR1=ATTR1_VAL;ATTR2=ATTR2_VAL, COOKIE2_NAME=COOKIE2_VALUE;ATTR1=ATTR1_VAL;ATTR2=ATTR2_VAL

Parameters:
cookieStr -
Returns:

deSerialize

public static Cookie deSerialize(java.io.DataInputStream in)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Reads a serialized Cookie from the supplied DataInputStream, and returns a new instance of that Cookie. The serialized cookie must have been serialized using the serialize(Cookie, DataOutputStream).

Parameters:
in -
Returns:
Throws:
